taskDescription: Checks in on Elena's health during video calls
Instructs Sarah to focus on Elena's prescribed exercises
Expresses urgency regarding Elena's health metrics
Provides support and guidance to Sarah about Elena's care
Negotiates with Sarah and Elena about combining fun and health activities
Asks for control over when ALFRED prompts for check-ins
Adjusts the frequency of notifications received from ALFRED
Collaborates with Sarah to change ALFRED's settings
Communicates her privacy concerns about data sharing
Feels a sense of empowerment after customizing ALFRED's interactions
Responds positively to the collaborative effort in setting preferences
Participates in discussions about Elena's therapy options
Supports Elena by suggesting activities that align with her interests
Encourages social engagement through ALFRED's features
Listens to Elena's concerns about feeling monitored
Collaborates with Sarah and Mike to find a suitable app for Elena
Adjusts the privacy settings on the ALFRED app.
Requests only specific data to be shared with her caregiver.
Feels anxious about the constant prompts regarding data sharing.
Seeks to maintain her independence by controlling data access.
Expresses discomfort with constant app notifications
Feels empowered when able to select app functionalities that suit her needs
Offers support to Elena in using the ALFRED app
Encourages open communication between Elena and her caregivers
Suggests finding a compromise for Elena's notifications
Aims to empower Elena by respecting her boundaries
Offers emotional support to Elena during her interaction with Mike
Encourages Elena to communicate her needs clearly
Advocates for Elena's autonomy in the use of the ALFRED app
Reinforces the importance of emotional connections in care
Promotes a collaborative approach to using technology in her care
Expresses frustration about needing to approve every app installation
Requests no unsolicited notifications from the system
Insists on controlling which data apps can access
Relents to consider downloading one app if she can manage the settings
Requests control over what data gets shared with caregivers
Agrees to allow reminders for medication to manage health better
Explores the ALFRED app with the help of her caregiver
Seeks reassurance about privacy and data sharing
Wants to feel empowered in her health decisions
Communicates her boundaries about unsolicited messages
Monitors user feedback regarding the ALFRED app
Reflects on the need to make the system more user-friendly
Considers how to balance support and personal autonomy in the app
